summary: Hearthfire homes don\'t respawn, interactive butter churn (milk is converted to butter), reharvestable in-house ingredients (SKSE version only).
descriptionHtml:
Requirements:
 + Hearthfire DLC
 + SKSE (Optional)

Description:
 + Hearthfire homes don\'t respawn (\"Interior Data > Encounter Zone\" set to \"NoResetZone\").
 + Replaced Hearthfire\'s default Churn with interactive one (milk is converted to butter).
 + Heljarchen Hall, Lakeview Manor and Windstad Manor in-house ingredients are reharvestable after 7 days upon location revisit (SKSE version only at this time).

Planned:
 + Overhaul reharvestable in-house ingredient functionality to be non SKSE compatible.
 + Reharvestable in-house ingredients in other player homes.
 + Interactive Mead brewing.
 + Make configurable via SkyUI\'s MCM.

Version History:
 + 0.4a (Alpha) - Initial public release.
 + 0.41a (Alpha) - Churn made follower compatible (now you can order someone around to make butter for you).

Notes:
 + Reharvesting functionality is a little wonky at this time, harversing states don\'t persist on save/load,  also visual appearance sometimes is off these are fixable by reentering location.
author: N1nj4R4bb1D
